verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
E
I believe in Jesus
I believe He is the Son of God
I believe He died and rose again
I believe He paid for us all

verse.lines:

(I believe that You're here)

(Standing)
Here with the power to heal us
(Here with the power to heal)
And the grace to forgive
